name: shabam
description: A replica of the popular music-recognition app Shazam

scripts.rm-services:dev: docker-compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml rm -f proxy api client fingerprint_worker identification_worker
scripts.start:dev--recreate: npm run rm-services:dev && npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev--recreate-proxy: npm run rm-services:dev-proxy && npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev--recreate-client: npm run rm-services:dev-client && npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev--recreate-api: npm run rm-services:dev-api && npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev--recreate-fingerprint-worker: npm run rm-services:dev-fingerprint-worker && npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev--recreate-identification-worke: npm run rm-services:dev-identification-worker && npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev--recreate-records-worker: npm run rm-services:dev-records-worker && npm run start:dev
scripts.restart:dev: docker-compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml restart proxy api client fingerprint_worker identification_worker
scripts.build:client--wasm: docker exec shabam_client npm run build:wasm
scripts.codegen:client: docker exec shabam_client npm run codegen
scripts.orm:update--db-metadata: docker exec shabam_api npm run orm:update--db-metadata
scripts.orm:drop--db-metadata: docker exec shabam_api npm run orm:drop--db-metadata
scripts.orm:reset--db-metadata: npm run orm:drop--db-metadata && npm run orm:update--db-metadata

author: Alexander Greff
